name: Chick'n Vasion
description:
STORY

You're a farmer who has a chicken farm, It's a pretty solid source of revenue but it's also very stressful.

Additionally all these chickens are so noisy, They're driving you insane.

INSTRUCTIONS

Use the arrow keys to move around, and press space to attack.

Each chicken you kill will give you money and reduce your stress, but beware! More money means more chickens! Try to keep yourself sane as long as you can while earning a max. of money

ADDITIONAL INFO

I made this game for my first Ludum Dare, I'm pretty proud with the result...
